fullText: Though it takes nearly three hours to tell, and wiedles its metaphors with the subtlety of a sledgehammer, 'Harmony' succeeds as both a monument to the sextet and a meditation on the price of art in impossible times.
dtliExcerpt: Though it takes nearly three hours to tell, and wiedles its metaphors with the subtlety of a sledgehammer, 'Harmony' succeeds as both a monument to the sextet and a meditation on the price of art in impossible times.
